entry.title: As Ukrainian Forces Advance, West Plays Down Threat From Russian Nuclear Weapons
entry.content: Ukraine accelerated its advance into Russian-held areas of the southern Kherson region, as Western officials said they hadn’t seen any activities out of the norm or causing concern from Russia’s nuclear forces.

entry.title: Iran's Crippled Economy Sustains Protests After Religious Police Lit Flame
entry.content: The country’s middle class is shrinking for the first time in decades amid U.S. sanctions, corruption and economic mismanagement.
